description:
New push up fast setup design, only one step to set the tent in 3 seconds and folds down in 5 second, no need to twist, very easy to use just like opening an umbrella. UV 50+ protective coating material to block harmful UV rays, provide the shade for your family. 2 side fine mesh screen to block the sand. 4 built-in sand pockets and 4 sand stakes to keep the tent on the ground. Tent and floor material meet CPAI-84 fire retardant standard. Light weight only 4.8 lb, comes with a carrying bag.
To see the video of Push up Instant Beach tent works, please copy and paste the link"
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cv2tqqXvCMA " to your browser.
Note:Please UN-lock the joints before folding legs to prevent damage at the joint.
title: Push up instant Beach Tent Beach Sunshelter
